page.title: 02BROADBRIDGE HEATH INDUSTRY-1
page.content: The Lawson and Hunt Broad Oak Industrial Estate is situated in Broadbridge Heath.It was designed by the architect Ray Phillips,and built in{1982,}during a depression.It comprises 30 units covering 113000 square feet of the 6.4 acre site.The units vary in size from 2000 to 7500 square feet. The units took about 18 months to sell from the beginning of 1983.Most of the work done there is{light {industry.}There are many companies manufacturing different products: perfume,aerosols,sliding doors,electronic equipment and printing equipment.Each company owns up to 5 units and the largest has applied for a permit to work over night.The Estate was part of the {by-pass project}and has provided jobs for many local people.
